I have been playing counterstrike since 2000 amongst many other games. Ive owned many different accounts and been at the highest rank and the lowest rank. No matter how many times i stop playing due to life, other games, or anything else, i always end up coming back to CSGO and after a bit, it always becomes my main game. This game has been so well-developed and fined tuned over the last 21 years. Most complaints are toxicity, hacking, or meta-changing update. Prime Status mostly fixes two of those. The other is valve keeping players on their toes and tilting the axis to keep the game fresh, and give more chances to different types of players other than the Chad 1-tapper. I find that the ones who complain about this game the most have 1k+ hours in it and an inventory of at least $400. This is a great game, you do not have to like it, but i have never heard anyone say CSGO is a bad game. Arguably the best of them all with consideration to what it is now than small LAN tournaments on 1.6 for a years magazine subscription to gameinformer
